BMZ/CARE.name: Improving the lifes of vulnerable returnee- and host community households in Sinuni and Wana sub- districts through the provision of protection services and agricultural support (multi-cluster project)
obj: The overall objective of the protection component is to expand general protection services (including legal assistance/counselling, PSS & HLP) to underserved areas with high needs in order to ensure safe and dignified returns and sustainable lives of people living in Arab villages and Neighboring villages in Sinuni Sub district, Sinjar districts.
Strengthening WASH basic infrastructure, resilience and livelihoods in return areas in Ninewa, Iraq
Strengthening WASH basic infrastructure, resilience and livelihoods in return areas in Ninewa, Iraq

UNOCHA/WVI.name: Provision of immediate life-saving assistance, agricultural assets/inputs and improved livelihoods for income generation for vulnerable IDPs, Returnees and Host communities in Ninewa Governorate

BMZ/ASB.name: Strengthening the resilience of conflict-affected residents and returnees in newly accessible areas through improving food security, livelihoods and solidarity

UNOCHA/Dorcas.name: Creating an enabling environment for sustainable livelihoods of vulnerable households in Sinjar and Telkaif District through the provision of protection and agricultural services.

UNOCHA.name: Strengthening Protection, HLP Response, and Prevention services during COVI9-19 Pandemic in Duhok, Ninewa governorates in Iraq.

UNICEF.name: Providing PSS, case managment and vocational training services for women and girls
obj:
Improve women’s and children’s
access to lifesaving GBV services 
and reduce risks of GBV through 
improved multi-sectoral and 
community-based protection.

UNHCR.name: Protection and Assistance programme for Refugees and IDPs in Duhok-Iraq
obj: Number of POC reached through protection monitoring
Access to legal assistance and legal remedies improved
Risk of SGBV is reduced and quality of response improved

GAC/CARE.name: WASH, Protection and SRHR   support to IDPs and Returnees in Iraq 2020-2021
obj: Water infrastructure repaired, maintained, or rehabilitated in IDP camps and Sinjar
Sanitation infrastructure in IDP camps and Sinjar maintained and/or repaired
Hygiene promotion undertaken in IDP camps and Sinjar
Garbage collection and desludging undertaken in IDP camps and authorities supported for ownership
Gender-sensitive hygiene items distributed to returnees in Sinjar

UNFPA.name: UNFPA Country Programe for Iraq 2020-2024
obj: Strengthened capacity of government and civil society institutions to mitigate and respond to gender-based violence and harmful practices, with a special focus on vulnerable women in humanitarian settings. (GBV)

Enhanced capacity of national government and civil society organizations to design and implement programmes on reproductive health, social cohesion and civic engagement for vulnerable young people, with special focus on marginalized adolescent girls in humanitarian settings (Youth Programme)

Increased capacity of Ministry of Health, and civil society organizations to deliver integrated quality reproductive health services that meet the needs of vulnerable populations, especially those in humanitarian settings (Health Cluster)

IHF-UNOCHA.name: National Consortium
obj: Increased capacity of Ministry of Health, and civil society organizations to deliver integrated quality reproductive health services that meet the needs of vulnerable populations, especially those in humanitarian settings (Health Cluster)
